General.Name: Bokwang Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Bokwang Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells aggregates, ascons, and ready mixed concrete in South Korea. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.
General.Address: Distribution Complex 3 Road 40, Daegu, South Korea
